name: 2024 7th International Conference on Computing and Big Data
content: Publication: All accepted full papers will be published in the ICCBD 2024 Conference Proceedings. The proceedings will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, and other prominent databases. It is mandatory for at least one author of each accepted paper to actively participate in this year's conference and deliver a presentation.
organizers: University of Shanghai for Science and Technology, China
